item.title: Simulating the Cosmos - N Body Simulation
item.description: Realtime Gravitational N-body simualtor with full OpenGL graphics pipeline accelerated with GLSL compute shader.

item.title: On Stylized Ocean Environment - Unreal Engine 5
item.description: Creating Stylized ocean environment in Unreal Engine 5 from scratch.

item.title: Texture Patisserie - Blender Texture Baking Addon
item.description: Blender Add-on designed to streamline the process of baking and exporting materials as PBR textures in just a few clicks. Designed for tasks such as baking and exporting texture atlases.

item.title: About
item.description:
I am Maythas Wangcharoenwong, currently a 4th year Computer Science student studying at Mahidol University International College.

My interests lie in Game Development, Computer Graphics, Real-Time simulations and Technical Art. I usually work with projects relating to Graphics programming, Real-time simulations, shaders, and sometimes making tools.

Contact:

  • Github: https://github.com/maythaswang
  • Email: maythas.wangcharoenwong@gmail.com

  • Blender
  • Photoshop
  • Clip Studio Paint

Game Engines

  • Unreal Engine 5

Graphics API:

  • OpenGL

Programming Languages:

  • C, C++
  • GLSL, HLSL
  • Python, Lua
  • Java, Rust, Go

Version Control Tools

Languages

  • Japanese (JLPT N3)
